name: Bleeding
note:
<Hide Turns>
<Category: Ailment>

<DoT Element: 1>

name: Burning

<DoT Variance: 20%>
<Category: Ailment>
<Reapply Add Turns>

</Custom DoT Formula>

<Help Description>

and length of affliction.
</Help Description>

name: Jinx
note:
<Help Description>
Take damage when casting magic
based on the spell's MP cost.
</Help Description>

<Custom Action Start Effect>
// Get the user's current HP.
user._jinxMp = user.mp;
</Custom Action Start Effect>

<Custom Initiate Effect>
// Check if the stored MP value exists.
if (user._jinxMp !== undefined && this.isMagical()) {
  // If it does, calculate the difference between the user's initial MP and the user's current MP after the cost.
  var difference = user._jinxMp - user.mp;
  // Check if the difference is greater than zero...
  if (difference > 0) {
    // If it is, calculate the amount of HP healed.
    var hp = Math.ceil(difference * 2.00);
    // Make the user lose that HP.
    user.gainHp(-hp);
    // Play a damage popup.
    user.startDamagePopup();
    // Clear the damage results.
    user.clearResult();
  }
}
user._jinxMp = undefined;
</Custom Initiate Effect>

name: Rusalka
Desert Boss Crystal
note:
<Custom Respond Effect>
if (this.getItemElements().contains($gameTemp._dBossCrysElems[$gameTemp._dBossPhase])) {
   $gameTemp._dBossElemDamage[$gameTemp._dBossPhase] += value;
}
</Custom Respond Effect>

<Custom Turn End Effect>
var currHp = this.hp;
if (currHp <= $gameTemp._dBossCrysHPPct[$gameTemp._dBossPhase] || $gameTemp._dBossElemDamage[$gameTemp._dBossPhase] >= $gameTemp._dBossCrysElemThreshold)
{
   // Transform trigger
   // Common Event has $gameTemp._dBossPhase++;
   $gameTemp.reserveCommonEvent(15);
}
</Custom Turn End Effect>

name: Desert Boss Summon Timer
note:
<Hide Turns>

<Custom Turn End Effect>
$gameTemp._dBossCrystalTimer++;
</Custom Turn End Effect>
